decision.Issue_Description: If pinned certificates are supported and present in the TOE, they adversely affect the ability to perform the CN/SAN checking in FCS_TLSC_EXT.1.2 Tests 1-6.

xpath-specified.h:p: The evaluator shall configure the reference identifier according to the AGD guidance and perform the following tests during a TLS connection. If the TOE supports certificate pinning, all pinned certificates must be removed before performing Tests 1 through 6. A pinned certificate must be added prior to performing Test 7.
